subject: test cases for inputs from file
msgSnippet: Hi All, Please guide me on how to write test cases where the input to the test cases will come as element values from a xml file. Right now I am planning to
messageBody:
Hi All,

Please guide me on how to write test cases where the input to the test cases will come as element values from a xml file.

Right now I am planning to write a new file for each test case. Is this a right way or is there a better way? Please help.

Regards
Deepa Nadig
